item.description:
Hi Folks!

Let's get together for a mid-week hike. The sun is finally back and it's heating up out there, but we can beat the heat by getting together early in the day, and enjoy some walking, talking and gazing at the beautiful landscape of Western Connecticut.

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at Devil's Den, which is a nature preserve in Weston, CT.

PLAN: We will do a loop, check out some water flowing over big rocks and hike for about 2 hours.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at 8:55 a.m. at the entrance and begin hiking at five after 9.

BRING: At least one bottle of WATER, and a snack if you like.

DIRECTIONS:

Park Website offers directions, or please see Google Maps(Pent Road dead-ends at the Devil's Den preserve's main parking area)
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Group Organizer) will be wearing red

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Early-bird Hiking Weekday Hike
